text: Naho rwa rukuta (neguye), rwari urw’abana b’imfubyi babiri b’abahungu muri wa mudugudu, kandi munsi yarwo hari harimo umutungo wabo, kandi ise yari umuntu mwiza. Nyagasani wawe yashatse ko babanza bagakura, maze bakazakuramo umutungo wabo, ku bw’impuhwe za Nyagasani wawe. Kandi (ibyo wabonye nkora) sinabikoze ku bwanjye (ahubwo byari ku itegeko rya Allah). Ngibyo ibisobanuro by’ibyo utashoboye kwihanganira
